        /* Mega menu styles */
        .group:hover .group-hover\:block {
            display: block;
        }

        .submenu {
            display: none;
            min-width: 200px;
        }

        .splide-bottom-sliders .splide__pagination {
            bottom: -9px;
        }

        .splide-bottom-comments .splide__pagination {
            bottom: -25px;
        }

        @keyframes ding {
            0% {
                transform: translateX(0);
            }

            1.2%,
            1.5% {
                transform: translateX(4px);
            }

            2.3%,
            2.5% {
                transform: translateX(-4px);
            }

            3.55%,
            3.75% {
                transform: translateX(4px);
            }

            5.45% {
                transform: translateX(-3px);
            }

            7.15% {
                transform: translateX(2px);
            }

            9.0% {
                transform: translateX(-1px);
            }

            11.0%,
            100% {
                transform: translateX(0);
            }
        }

        .shake {
            animation: ding 10s linear infinite;
        }

        .__jivoMobileButton {
            zoom: 0.6 !important;
        }

        .__jivoDesktopButton {
            zoom: 0.8 !important;
            bottom: 78px !important;
        }

        .what {
            transform: scale(0.9);
            bottom: 10px;
            right: 12px;
        }

        .tooltip:hover .tooltiptext {
            visibility: visible;
            opacity: 1;
        }

        @media (max-width: 1024px) {
            .what {
                transform: scale(0.7);
                right: 4px;
                bottom: 5px;
            }
        }

        .glow {
            position: absolute;
            inset: 0;
            border: 1px solid transparent;
            background: linear-gradient(90deg, rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5), transparent);
            z-index: 1;
            border-radius: 30px;
            animation: spin 5s linear infinite;
            opacity: 0.5;
        }

        @keyframes spin {
            0% {
                transform: rotate(0deg);
            }

            100% {
                transform: rotate(360deg);
            }
        }
    </style>

    #nprogress {
      pointer-events: none;
    }

    #nprogress .bar {
      background: var(--livewire-progress-bar-color, #29d);

      position: fixed;
      z-index: 1031;
      top: 0;
      left: 0;

      width: 100%;
      height: 2px;
    }

    /* Fancy blur effect */
    #nprogress .peg {
      display: block;
      position: absolute;
      right: 0px;
      width: 100px;
      height: 100%;
      box-shadow: 0 0 10px var(--livewire-progress-bar-color, #29d), 0 0 5px var(--livewire-progress-bar-color, #29d);
      opacity: 1.0;

      -webkit-transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px);
          -ms-transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px);
              transform: rotate(3deg) translate(0px, -4px);
    }

    /* Remove these to get rid of the spinner */
    #nprogress .spinner {
      display: block;
      position: fixed;
      z-index: 1031;
      top: 15px;
      right: 15px;
    }

    #nprogress .spinner-icon {
      width: 18px;
      height: 18px;
      box-sizing: border-box;

      border: solid 2px transparent;
      border-top-color: var(--livewire-progress-bar-color, #29d);
      border-left-color: var(--livewire-progress-bar-color, #29d);
      border-radius: 50%;

      -webkit-animation: nprogress-spinner 400ms linear infinite;
              animation: nprogress-spinner 400ms linear infinite;
    }

    .nprogress-custom-parent {
      overflow: hidden;
      position: relative;
    }

    .nprogress-custom-parent #nprogress .spinner,
    .nprogress-custom-parent #nprogress .bar {
      position: absolute;
    }

    @-webkit-keyframes nprogress-spinner {
      0%   { -webkit-transform: rotate(0deg); }
      100% { -webkit-transform: rotate(360deg); }
    }

      0%   { transform: rotate(0deg); }
      100% { transform: rotate(360deg); }
    }

        function fetchPrices() {
            fetch('/api/top-bar-prices')
                .then(response => response.json())
                .then(data => {

                    document.getElementById('ons_tl').textContent = data.ons_tl + ' $';
                    document.getElementById('gold_has_tl').textContent = data.gold_has_tl + ' ₺';
                    document.getElementById('silver_tl').textContent = data.silver_tl + ' ₺';
                    document.getElementById('usd_tl').textContent = data.usd_tl + ' ₺';

                    const onsChange = document.getElementById('ons_change');
                    onsChange.className = 'flex items-center ' + (data.ons_change > 0 ? 'text-green-600' : (data.ons_change < 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-gray-600')) + ' ml-2';
                    onsChange.querySelector('span').className = data.ons_change > 0 ? 'inline-block' : data.ons_change < 0 ? 'inline-block transform rotate-180' : 'inline-block transform rotate-90';
                    onsChange.querySelector('span + span').textContent = data.ons_change + '%';

                    const goldChange = document.getElementById('gold_change');
                    goldChange.className = 'flex items-center ' + (data.gold_change > 0 ? 'text-green-600' : (data.gold_change < 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-gray-600')) + ' ml-2';
                    goldChange.querySelector('span').className = data.gold_change > 0 ? 'inline-block' : data.gold_change < 0 ? 'inline-block transform rotate-180' : 'inline-block transform rotate-90';
                    goldChange.querySelector('span + span').textContent = data.gold_change + '%';

                    const silverChange = document.getElementById('silver_change');
                    silverChange.className = 'flex items-center ' + (data.silver_change > 0 ? 'text-green-600' : (data.silver_change < 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-gray-600')) + ' ml-2';
                    silverChange.querySelector('span').className = data.silver_change > 0 ? 'inline-block' : data.silver_change < 0 ? 'inline-block transform rotate-180' : 'inline-block transform rotate-90';
                    silverChange.querySelector('span + span').textContent = data.silver_change + '%';

                    const usdTlChange = document.getElementById('usd_tl_change');
                    usdTlChange.className = 'flex items-center ' + (data.usd_tl_change > 0 ? 'text-green-600' : (data.usd_tl_change < 0 ? 'text-red-600' : 'text-gray-600')) + ' ml-2';
                    usdTlChange.querySelector('span').className = data.usd_tl_change > 0 ? 'inline-block' : data.usd_tl_change < 0 ? 'inline-block transform rotate-180' : 'inline-block transform rotate-90';
                    usdTlChange.querySelector('span + span').textContent = data.usd_tl_change + '%';
                })
                .catch(error => console.error('Error fetching prices:', error));
        }

        setInterval(fetchPrices, 30000);
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', fetchPrices);
    </script>
    <script>
        window.addEventListener('scroll', function() {
            var header = document.getElementById('main-header2');
            var content = document.querySelector('#main');
            var headerHeight = header.offsetHeight;

            if (window.scrollY > headerHeight) {
                header.classList.add('fixed', 'top-0', 'left-0', 'z-50', 'w-full', 'fade-in');
                header.classList.remove('fade-out');
                content.style.paddingTop = headerHeight + 'px';
            } else {
                header.classList.remove('fixed', 'top-0', 'left-0', 'z-50', 'w-full', 'fade-in');
                header.classList.add('fade-out');
                content.style.paddingTop = '0';
            }
        });
    </script>

    <script>
        document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {

            fetch('/profile-chack?noCache=' + new Date().getTime())
                .then(response => response.json()) // Doğrudan metin olarak alıyoruz
                .then(data => {
                    const isAuthenticated = data; // Gelen veriyi 'true' veya 'false' olarak kontrol ediyoruz
                    const dropdown = document.getElementById('profile2-dropdown');
                    const userMenuButton = document.getElementById('user-menu-button');
                    const dropdownM = document.getElementById('profile-dropdown');

                    if (dropdown) {
                        // Gelen veri 'true' ise, profile2-dropdown div'ini görünür yap
                        if (isAuthenticated) {
                            dropdown.classList.remove('hidden2');

                        } else {
                            dropdown.classList.add('hidden2');
                            if (userMenuButton) {
                                userMenuButton.href = "https://rimagold.com.tr/login";
                            }
                        }
                    }

                    if (dropdownM) {
                        // Gelen veri 'true' ise, profile2-dropdown div'ini görünür yap
                        if (isAuthenticated) {
                            dropdownM.classList.remove('hidden2');

                        } else {
                            dropdownM.classList.add('hidden2');
                            if (userMenuButton) {
                                userMenuButton.href = "https://rimagold.com.tr/login";
                            }
                        }
                    }
                })
                .catch(error => console.error('Error:', error));
        });
